p: AGNPP was negatively correlated with species richness ( Fig 6; F = 32.74, df. = 38, p < 0.001, R 2 = 0.4628). Linear regression model clearly indicates that there is decreased species richness but increased net primary productivity in invaded plots, and vice versa in uninvaded plots ( Fig 6). Analysis was done using R studio Version 1.1.463.
